hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
artifactory_host=${ARTIFACTORY_HOST} User="$artifactory_user:$artifactory_password"
cd TrunkPackRam NEWTAG=`./MakeBrdVersion.sh` git describe --tags git log -n10 --decorate --oneline head -12 Bsps/Common/Include/BrdVersion.h | tail -3
BOARDNAME=$BOARD if [ "$BOARDNAME" == "M1000_MSBG" ] && \ ./buildAll.sh --help | grep board= | grep -q M1000_ESBC; then BOARDNAME="M1000_ESBC" fi echo BOARDNAME=${BOARDNAME} > ../generated_sbc_version.properties
#if [[ $GERRIT_BRANCH =~ "collab/" ]]; then # GERRIT_BRANCH=`git branch -r --contains $(git describe --tag --abbrev=0) | head -1 | awk -F'/' '{print $NF}'` #fi echo GERRIT_BRANCH=${GERRIT_BRANCH} >> ../generated_sbc_version.properties
# if the REFSPEC=<Branch name> # CHANGESNumbers = All the chnages that should be updated with DRT label if [[ $REFSPEC == $GERRIT_BRANCH ]]; then FirstRefs=$(echo $CHANGES | cut -d" " -f1 | cut -d: -f3) REFSPEC=refs/changes/00/$FirstRefs CHANGESNumbers="" OnlySubModule=true TARGET=${NEWTAG}-$(echo $FirstRefs | cut -d/ -f1) else CHANGESNumbers="$(echo $REFSPEC | sed 's:refs/changes/../::') " OnlySubModule=false TARGET=${NEWTAG}-$(echo $REFSPEC | sed 's:refs/changes/../::; s:/:-:g') fi
# Find if this build should use another Opensorce Images with the same Commit change-ID chmod 600 ../id_rsa_gerrit change=`echo $REFSPEC | cut -d/ -f4` ID=$(ssh -p 29418 -i ../id_rsa_gerrit jenkins@test-gerrit gerrit query $change | grep -m1 id: | cut -d: -f2 | sed 's: ::g') ls -l ../id_rsa_gerrit chmod 600 ../id_rsa_gerrit ssh -p 29418 -i ../id_rsa_gerrit jenkins@test-gerrit gerrit query --current-patch-set change:$ID branch:$GERRIT_BRANCH status:open | \ grep -A30 'project: TP/OpenSource' | grep 'project\|revision' > othersCommits.txt || echo ChangeId not found
cat othersCommits.txt
while IFS= read -r line; do if echo $line | grep -q project; then path=$(echo $line | cut -d: -f2 | sed 's:TP/::; s: ::g'); elif echo $line | grep -q revision; then revision=$(echo $line | cut -d: -f2) git ls-files --stage ../$path git update-index --cacheinfo 160000 $revision $path git ls-files --stage ../$path fi done < othersCommits.txt
if [[ $CHANGES != "" ]]; then for rep in $CHANGES; do path=$(echo $rep | cut -d: -f1 | sed 's:TP/::') revision=$(echo $rep | cut -d: -f2) echo update $path to revision $revision git update-index --cacheinfo 160000 $revision $path CHANGESNumbers="$CHANGESNumbers$(echo $rep | cut -d: -f3) " # Add to the Target name directory the first and last chars of each submodule and PS # Example, for OpenRG: _OG<PatchSet number> TARGET=${TARGET}_$(echo $path | awk -F/ '{print $NF}' | sed 's/.//2g')$(echo ${path: -1})$(echo ${rep: -1}) done fi
echo Tatget directory is: $TARGET echo TARGET=${TARGET} >> ../generated_sbc_version.properties echo REFSPEC=${REFSPEC} >> ../generated_sbc_version.properties
# Remove old external files before downloading from Artifactory rm -f TPApp/MPCBin/*external_version_data.h
echo CHANGESNumbers=${CHANGESNumbers} >> ../generated_sbc_version.properties # Download the Images from the Artifactory if [ ! -e GetImages.sh ]; then curl -ks https://test-gerrit/static/GetImages.sh --output GetImages.sh; fi chmod +x GetImages.sh ./GetImages.sh $BOARDNAME $artifactory_host $User "" "-i ../id_rsa_gerrit jenkins@test-gerrit"
# Take the relevant TP/GWApp that corresponding to this Submodule change instead of using the branch # In case of no TP/GWApp change was added to this DRT if [ "$OnlySubModule" == true ]; then tagTocompile="" for rep in $CHANGES; do RepoName=$(echo $rep | cut -d: -f1 | sed 's:.*/::') echo Check $RepoName............ Search it $BOARDNAME.deps # $f will contain the the exact external_version_data.h name according the .deps file f=$(grep "/$RepoName " ../OpenSource/$BOARDNAME.deps | grep data.h | sed 's:.* ::' || echo Not found) # The file exist? if [ -f TPApp/MPCBin/$f ]; then t1=$(grep EXTERNAL_VERSION TPApp/MPCBin/$f | cut -d'"' -f2 | cut -d- -f1 | cut -d_ -f1) echo Found TAG $t1 in file $f -- Check if this TAG is the most advanced TAG # This if is relevant if OpenRG and acLinux or Hosted02 and Hostedbl were choosen if [ $(echo 0$t1 | sed 's:.*\.::') -gt $(echo 0$tagTocompile | sed 's:.*\.::') ]; then tagTocompile=$t1 echo Change to TAG: $tagTocompile found in Submodule $RepoName fi fi done if [ ! -z "$tagTocompile" ]; then #echo Do not nothing, need to involve the QA (Rekefet) if it is right to do it echo Checkout TP/GWApp compilation environment to $tagTocompile #git checkout -f $tagTocompile #NEWTAG=`./MakeBrdVersion.sh` fi fi
cd .. sudo chmod -R 755 . sudo chown -R centos:centos .
sudo mount -a cd TrunkPackRam

artifactory_host=${ARTIFACTORY_HOST} User="$artifactory_user:$artifactory_password"
if [ ! -d "$WORKSPACE/CompilationResults" ]; then rm -rf $WORKSPACE/CompilationResults fi
if curl -ks -u $User https://$artifactory_host/api/storage/sbc-review/com/ac/sbc/DRT/Firmware/${TARGET}/${BOARDNAME}_SIP.cmp | grep -q uri then echo ${TARGET}/${BOARDNAME}_SIP.cmp exist already!... Abort without error; exit 0 fi
cd TrunkPackRam
if [ $BOARDNAME == "HostedTP" ]; then SERVER="--server=localhost "; else SERVER=""; fi ./buildAll.sh --board=${BOARDNAME} --sip=yes --user=no --fast=yes $SERVER --custom-version=-d$BUILD_NUMBER
cd ${WORKSPACE}/CompilationResults/ram${BOARDNAME}_SIP/TPApp/MPCBin mv ram${BOARDNAME}_SIP.cmp ${BOARDNAME}_SIP.cmp
zip -r ${BOARDNAME}_SIP.map.zip ram${BOARDNAME}_SIP.map zip -r ${BOARDNAME}_SIP.elf.zip ram${BOARDNAME}_SIP.elf

echo POST action: FAILED board ${BOARDNAME}_SIP.cmp echo CHANGES: $CHANGESNumbers for rep in $CHANGESNumbers; do
change=`echo $rep | cut -d/ -f1` ps=`echo $rep | cut -d/ -f2` chmod 600 id_rsa_gerrit
echo Send faild message to Gerrit - $change,$ps ssh -p 29418 -i id_rsa_gerrit jenkins@test-gerrit gerrit review \ --message "'Compilation Failed - $BUILD_URL'" \ --notify OWNER \ --label DRT=-1 \ --tag "'autogenerated:drt'" \ $change,$ps
done

com.lookout.jenkins.EnvironmentScript.script:
if [[ $CHANGES != "" ]]; then for rep in $CHANGES; do revisions=$(echo $rep | cut -d: -f3 | sed 's:/:/revisions/:') curl -kns --anyauth -X POST https://test-gerrit/a/changes/$revisions/review \ -d "{\"message\": \"DRT compilation has started, clear DRT score - $BUILD_URL\", \"labels\": {\"DRT\": \"0\"}, \"notify\": \"NONE\", \"tag\": \"autogenerated:drt\"}" \ -H 'Content-Type: application/json' > /dev/null done fi
if [[ $REFSPEC != $GERRIT_BRANCH ]]; then revisions=$(echo $REFSPEC | cut -d/ -f4,5 | sed 's:/:/revisions/:') curl -kns --anyauth -X POST https://test-gerrit/a/changes/$revisions/review \ -d "{\"message\": \"DRT compilation has started, clear DRT score - $BUILD_URL\", \"labels\": {\"DRT\": \"0\"}, \"notify\": \"NONE\", \"tag\": \"autogenerated:drt\"}" \ -H 'Content-Type: application/json' > /dev/null fi
